tasks.label: SwarmUI: Dev (4100)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -NoLogo -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item Env:NODE_OPTIONS -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:HOST='127.0.0.1'; $env:PORT='4100'; fnm exec --using v22.22.0 npm.cmd run dev:local"
